caption:
The photograph is a close-up portrait of an older man, capturing his expression in vivid detail. The man wears a patterned flat cap tilted on his head, shading his eyes slightly. His facial features are rugged and prominent, with deep-set eyes and visible signs of aging. He exhibits a slightly open-mouthed expression, revealing a few missing teeth, adding character to his weathered face.

He is dressed in a dark, open-neck shirt layered under a lighter, striped shirt which is also open to reveal his chest. The texture of his skin and the detail in his garments are particularly striking, showing a mixture of toughness and vulnerability.

The background behind him is blurred, focusing the viewer's attention on him. The lighting infuses the scene with a warm, natural tone, accentuating the contours of his face and the texture of his clothing.

Overall, the photograph conveys a strong sense of the man's personality and life experiences, encapsulated in the intimate and detailed portrayal of his appearance.
title: A Nebraskan for more than half his life, Charlie Gross has farmed, boxed, raised dogs and sold hosiery and light bulbs.
